testcase.name: Using PUP Appointment System Login- Details
testcase.system-out: Given def step0 = 'Using Chrome as a browser' ............................. passed * configure driver = {type:'chromedriver', executable: 'C:/Program Files/Google/Chrome/Application/chromedriver.exe'} . passed And def step1 = 'Browser navigates to PUP search website' ................. passed * driver 'https://www.pup.edu.ph' ......................................... passed And def step2 = 'Maximize Browser' ........................................ passed * maximize() .............................................................. passed And def step3 = 'User click services modal' ............................... passed * click('.services-widget') ............................................... passed And def step4 = 'User click Applicant button' ............................. passed * click('{^a}Applicant') .................................................. passed And def step5 = 'Take Screenshot' ......................................... passed * driver.screenshot() ..................................................... passed And def step6 = 'User waiting time' ....................................... passed * waitUntil("document.readyState == 'complete'") .......................... passed And def step7 = 'User click appointment' .................................. passed * click("//span[contains(text(),'Schedule an appointment prior to visiting the Univ')]") . passed And def step8 = 'User waiting time' ....................................... passed * waitUntil("document.readyState == 'complete'") .......................... passed And def step8 = 'User click student login button' ......................... passed * click("//a[contains(@class,'btn-block bg-danger')]") .................... passed And def step9 = 'Clear waiting time' ...................................... passed * waitUntil("document.readyState == 'complete'") .......................... passed And def step10 = 'Clear Fields' ........................................... passed * clear('#studno') ........................................................ passed * clear('#SelectMonth') ................................................... passed * clear('#SelectDay') ..................................................... passed * clear('#SelectYear') .................................................... passed * clear('#password') ...................................................... passed And def step11 = 'Take screenshot' ........................................ passed * driver.screenshot() ..................................................... passed And def step12 = 'User waiting time' ...................................... passed * waitUntil("document.readyState == 'complete'") .......................... passed And def step13 = 'User input details' ..................................... passed * input('#studno', '2019-00029-CM-0') ..................................... passed * select('#SelectMonth','6') .............................................. passed * select('#SelectDay','15') ............................................... passed * select('#SelectYear','2000') ............................................ passed * input('#password','EmeLangPoItoPeroNaganaPoItoSaTruePasswordKoPo') ...... passed And def step14 = 'Take screenshot' ........................................ passed * driver.screenshot() ..................................................... passed When def step15 = 'User waiting time' ..................................... passed * waitUntil("document.readyState == 'complete'") .......................... passed Then def step16 = 'User click login button'
